content: My name is Nadezhda Stashkevich. I am a beginner front-end developer. I have completed courses from Rolling Scopes School (EPAM). I have practical skills in web page layout, creating front-end parts of sites in Javascript / TypeScript, Angular. Worked with Webpack and Git. Participated in both individual and team development. I continue to improve my skills, planning to become proficient web developer.
Video tutorials on YouTube, online courses on Stepik.org
Web pages layout in HTML and CSS according to Figma layouts. SCSS and SASS preprocessors. Responsive web design, multimedia. Bootstrap library. Setting up VS Code plugins. Using DevTools. JS basics.

Markdown. Working with Git, GitHub. Chrome Dev Tools and VS Code. CSS Flex. Solving problems on Codewars. JS data types, algorithms, loops. Working with the DOM Webpack basics. NodeJS, NPM. Сreating projects on JS and Webpack.

Git, GitHub. Responsive design, media queries, CSS Flex, SCSS. Algorithmic tasks, functions, Scope. Working with Figma HTML forms, DOM, DOM events. Modules in JS, WebPack. Server interaction. OOP, classes. Codewars. Interviews with mentors. Working with TypeScript, ESLint. Development UI components, creation of team projects.

Creating an Angular project, adding ESLint, project structure. Angular components, directives and pipes. Modules, routing. Services. Forms. RxJS, Observable, Subject. NgRx, Store. Using Material UI components, PrimeNG. Creating the team project.
widget for the Chrome browser, an analogue of the application of the same name
website with information about animals from various zoos
quiz app for recognizing birds by their voices
analogue of the application of the same name for task management, team project
website for booking airline tickets, team project
